Last updated: January 2025

UnfollowLens does not collect or store any personal information.

1. Service Overview

UnfollowLens is a free web service that analyzes Instagram data files to find accounts that don't follow you back.

2. Data Processing

  • Uploaded Files: Never sent to a server. Processed entirely in your browser.
  • Data Storage: Results are only displayed in your browser.
  • Account Info: No registration or login required.

3. Security

  • All communications encrypted via HTTPS.
  • Uploaded files are never sent to a server. Processed entirely in your browser.

4. Contact

Contact us at unfollowlens@gmail.com.
